title: Steam and Stars
description: A junior Ridge engineer named Pyra has been quietly spending her private hours modifying the summit observation post's old geothermal sensors into a long-range atmospheric scanner. She has detected a repeating signal from somewhere in the Red Wastes and wants help determining if it is natural or artificial.

turns.narrative: Pyra's modified equipment fills the observation post. She shows you a readout — a clean, rhythmic pulse repeating every ninety seconds with machine-like regularity. Station Commander Vrex is suspicious of what Pyra has built and wants the unauthorised equipment removed.
turns.choice_a: Advocate for Pyra to Vrex — the signal deserves investigation
turns.consequence_a: Vrex is reluctant but agrees to a one-week provisional window to document the signal properly.
turns.choice_b: Study the equipment and signal independently, bypassing Vrex for now
turns.consequence_b: You analyse the signal and confirm it cannot be geothermal in origin — it's directional and encoded.

turns.narrative: The signal appears to originate from a fixed point approximately sixty kilometres into the Red Wastes — near the site of the old city of Crestfall which was consumed in the initial Scourge event.
turns.choice_a: Recommend an official Expedition survey of the Crestfall coordinates
turns.consequence_a: Vrex, now intrigued, forwards the recommendation. An Expedition planning document is started.
turns.choice_b: Recommend Pyra document everything and submit a research proposal to the Academic Quarter
turns.consequence_b: Pyra's proposal gets academic backing. Funding is approved for a small recon drone mission.

turns.narrative: Regardless of next steps, Pyra's sensor array has produced something valuable.
turns.choice_a: Help Pyra formally patent her modified sensor design through the Authority
turns.consequence_a: The design is patented. Pyra receives a modest stipend and recognition.
turns.choice_b: Simply thank Pyra and let her continue her work informally
turns.consequence_b: Pyra continues monitoring quietly. The signal remains active and consistent.

expedition_recommended.description: Official Expedition survey of Crestfall coordinates recommended.

academic_proposal.description: Academic funding approved for recon drone mission.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

conclusion: Official Expedition survey of Crestfall coordinates recommended.
